In observance of #Juneteenth, Rockets staff visited Freedmen’s Town, a nationally registered historical site. The site was originally a community located in the fourth ward of Houston that began in 1865 as the destination for former enslaved people in Texas & Louisiana. https://t.co/mTes7Ctuta
